segments.text: I observe the scene, woman at the sink with her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s polishing it away, ignoring the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, the overflow catches my eye, water gushing out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s shocking how fast the puddle’s growing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s right in it, foot deep, no reaction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy’s climbing the stool to the cookie jar boldly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s reaching in, probably grabbing a handful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s anticipating, arm stretched high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They make a cute team, sneaky siblings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool’s tilting, that’s a bit scary though.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Garden outside looks inviting, sunny day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m surprised no one’s yelling about the water yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in chaos, I think.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the kids’ mischief is amusing.
segments.speaker: PAR
